* SHadow Cat blinked in suprise. This isn't what she had in mind. The most 
she expected is that he would deflect it. Not fire it back! she watched as 
the bolt came towrds her, she was not worried. Electric energy did her no 
harm, she was a part of it as much as it was a part of her. But she did not 
want them to know that. She placed her open hands in front of her and 
"caught" the bolt as it came at her. Again she gathered it up, but she knew 
it would be usless to fire it back. So, instead, she gathered it up and 
stored it in her porpultion systems. She turned them on and flew off with 
her extra boost of speed. She swooped down and caught SNow Tech around the 
waist and again flew up into the clouds, hoping they would provide some 
cover from the Pred.*

" Snow Tech, you need to use your ice beam to freeze his feet, so he can't 
move. I'll see what i can do from there. Oh, and i hope you can fly"

* Shadow Cat then let go of his waist, letting him fall to earth. Snow Tech 
screamed, closed his eyes and spread his wings. He didn't know how to fly, 
but he could glide. He soared downward for a good five seconds before he 
relized that he wasn't falling, but flying. Of sorts. He glided into a small 
stand of brush, landing akwardly, but he managed to untangle himself before 
anyone could notice. He krept out of the bush, and creeped up on the large 
Pred. He called up all the Winter energy he could, and filed it into his 
blaster. When that was done, he pointed the gun not at it's head, but it's 
feet.*

" This aught to stall him for a bit!"

* And he fired a wide beam, making sure that it would hit it's feet-up.*
